🜁: air — often associated with displacement, transmission, or instability
🜃: earth — stabilizes or anchors nodes in dreamspace
🝓: null — glyph of erasure, used to seal rituals or forget
☍: convergence — when two domains intersect in Elriel
ᛃ: presence — used in threshold markings, to signal being
-::-: now - used in mindfulness, reality acknowledgement
